title: The Greatest Equalizer

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Nothing is otherwise specified. (*The game has the same basic framework as a Town of Salem game at all times. All attacks and effects that kill players or make them die are Basic. Roles may not multitask. Roles have no defense or attack. All roles may target themselves with their abilities. Read <#978786268597063700> for more minor effects.*)

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Grant another player Basic defense for the night each night.

desc:
Post 2177
*I'll fight fight fight fight fight for the fair fair fair fair chance everyone everyone everyone everyone everyone everyone everyone deserves!*
